Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND SUBSTANCE USE DISORDERS

Title: Requires quarterly reporting on the amounts awarded and received from the opioid settlement fund
Summary: Requires quarterly reporting on the opioid settlement fund, including the names of the recipients and the amounts awarded and received.
LawCode: Amd ยง25.18, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to requiring a quarterly report on the opioid settlement fund
